item.title: Tinkering with Tech: My Home Lab Adventures
item.description:
Home Lab üè†üíª

Welcome to my Home Lab! This is where I experiment with Kubernetes, GitOps, automation, and security while refining my skills in DevOps and infrastructure management.

üîπ About This Lab

My home lab is designed to:
‚úÖ Test and deploy self-hosted applications securely.
‚úÖ Explore GitOps workflows for managing infrastructure.
‚úÖ Improve Kubernetes automation and monitoring.
‚úÖ Experiment with DevSecOps and security best practices.

üîπ Projects & Documentation

Below are the key topics I‚Äôve documented from my home lab setup. Each link takes you to a detailed breakdown of the implementation, challenges, and lessons learned.

About Me

Hi, I‚Äôm Darnell Xavier Daniell, a Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) and IT Infrastructure Engineer with a passion for automation, DevOps, and cloud-native technologies. With expertise in Kubernetes, containerization, and GitOps, I specialize in building scalable, secure, and resilient infrastructures for modern applications.

I‚Äôve implemented infrastructure automation, optimized CI/CD pipelines, and led enterprise IT transformations across Windows and Linux environments. My work focuses on security, observability, and reliability, ensuring seamless deployments and efficient system operations.
